text:
(1)

984-960 Hopkinson Ave., west side, north from Hegeman Ave., showing the Ryerson house, which was erected in 1840, at its new site. On the extreme right is P.S. 165.

August 1923.

.Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(2)

The same, at a later date. The Ryerson house is No..984.

August 1924.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(3)

The same, showing the John Ryerson house (peaked roof, background) viewed from New Lotts Road (foreground).
August 1923.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
